# bal-field-message

`bal-field-message` is a child component of `bal-field`.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                       | Type                                       | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Defines the color of the message. | `"" \| "danger" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `''`    |
